table.name: vtiger_restfulapi
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_restfulapi` ( `restfulapiid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `token` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` VARCHAR(15) DEFAULT NULL, `calls` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `expiration_date` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`restfulapiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_restfulapicf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_restfulapicf` ( `vtiger_restfulapicf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_restfulapicf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
